Diary No(s). 4605/2025
ITEM NO.54               COURT NO.12               SECTION XI
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
SPECIAL LEAVE PETITION (CIVIL) Diary No(s). 4605/2025
[Arising out of impugned final judgment and order dated  24-09-2024
in SA No. 394/2022 passed by the High Court of Judicature at 
Allahabad, Lucknow Bench]
KAUSHALENDRA PRATAP & ORS.                         Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
STATE OF UTTAR PRADESH & ORS.                      Respondent(s)
IA No. 95239/2025 - APPLICATION FOR TRANSPOSITION
IA No. 48993/2025 - CONDONATION OF DELAY IN FILING
IA No. 109562/2025 - DELETING THE NAME OF PETITIONER/RESPONDENT
IA No. 48995/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING O.T.
IA No. 88602/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING O.T.
IA No. 52436/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING O.T.
IA No. 150767/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING O.T.
IA No. 95062/2025 - INTERVENTION/IMPLEADMENT
IA No. 94928/2025 - INTERVENTION/IMPLEADMENT
IA No. 89971/2025 - INTERVENTION/IMPLEADMENT
IA No. 152525/2025 - INTERVENTION/IMPLEADMENT
IA No. 88601/2025 - INTERVENTION/IMPLEADMENT
IA No. 151250/2025 - INTERVENTION/IMPLEADMENT
IA No. 52435/2025 - PERMISSION TO FILE ADDITIONAL 
DOCUMENTS/FACTS/ANNEXURES
IA No. 48996/2025 - PERMISSION TO FILE LENGTHY LIST OF DATES
 
Date : 04-07-2025 This matter was called on for hearing today.
CORAM :  HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE PAMIDIGHANTAM SRI NARASIMHA
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE R. MAHADEVAN
(PARTIAL COURT WORKING DAYS BENCH)
For Petitioner(s) :Mr. Devadatt Kamat, Sr. Adv.
                   Mr. Gopal Shankarnarayan, Sr. Adv.
                   Mr. Shailesh Madiyal, Sr. Adv. 
                   Mr. Rudreshwar Singh, Sr. Adv. 
                   Mr. Revanta Solanki, Adv.

                   Mr. V.C. Shukla, Adv. 
                   Mr. Shashwat Anand, Adv. 
1 of 2Diary No(s). 4605/2025
                   Mr. Ravanta Solanki, Adv. 
                   Mr. Anchit Singla, Adv. 
                   Mr. Munawar Hussain, Adv. 
                   
                   Mr. Gopal Shankarnarayan, Sr. Adv.
                   Ms. Pallavi Pratap Singh, Adv. 
                   Mr. Revant Solanki, Adv. 
                   Mr. Shashwat Anand, Adv. 
                   Mr. Aakarsh Kamra, AOR
                   Ms. Ishita Chouwdhury, Adv. 
                   Mr. Shourya Dasgupta, Adv. 
                                      
For Respondent(s) :Ms. Rajdipa Behura, Sr. Adv.
                   Dr. Vijendra Singh, AOR
                   Ms. Apurva Singh, Adv.
                                      
                   Mr. Adarsh Verma , AOR
                   Mr. Rudreshwar Singh, Sr. Adv.
                   Mr. Revanta Solanki, Adv.
                   Mr. Shashwat Anand, Adv.
                   Mr. Rajesh Inamdar, Adv.
                   
For Impleaders     Mr. Rudreshwar Singh, Sr. Adv. 
                   Mr. Revanta Solanki, Adv. 
                   Mr. Shashwat Anand, Adv. 
                   Ms. Komal Mundhra, AOR
          UPON hearing the counsel the Court made the following
                             O R D E R
1. On the oral request of learned counsel appearing for the
petitioner(s), The UP Public Service Commission (UPPSC) is made a
party in the present proceedings.
2. Let a copy of the  Special Leave Petition be served on the
standing counsel of the UPPSC.
3. IA Nos. 95062, 151250 and 152525 of 2025 (Applications for
Impleadment) are allowed. The cause-title be amended accordingly. 
4. List along with D. No. 8074 of 2025 and connected matters.
(KAPIL TANDON)                                  (NIDHI WASON)
COURT MASTER (SH)                             COURT MASTER (NSH)
2 of 2
